```{r}
worldchamps |> mutate(TIME = str_sub(TIME, start = 1, end = 5))
```

```{r}
worldchamps_wide <- worldchamps |> mutate(PB = str_detect(TIME, "PB", negate = FALSE), AU20R = str_detect(TIME, "AU20R", negate = FALSE), NU20R = str_detect(TIME, "NU20R", negate = FALSE), SB = str_detect(TIME, "SB", negate = FALSE), NB = str_detect(TIME, "NB", negate = FALSE)) |> mutate(TIME = str_sub(TIME, start = 1, end = 5))
```

```{r}
worldchamps_long <- worldchamps_wide |> pivot_longer(c(7:11), names_to = "RECORD_TYPE", values_to = "RECORD")
```

```{r}
worldchamps |> mutate(separate(TIME, into = c("TIME", "RECORD"), sep = 5))
```

```{r}
worldchamps_wide |> mutate(as.Date(TIME)) 
```

```{r}
worldchamps_wide |> separate(TIME, into = c("MIN", "SEC"), sep = ".") |> mutate(TIME = (MIN*60) + SEC)
```

```{r}
worldchamps_round <- worldchamps_wide |> mutate(TIME = str_replace(TIME, ":", ".")) |> mutate(TIME = as.double(TIME))
```

```{r}
worldchamps_round |> separate(TIME, into = c("MIN","SEC"), sep = ".")
```

```{r}
worldchamps_wide |> str_remove(TIME, ":")
```
